column4: can someone tell me how to setup sata disks? I do not get any block device
do not you get /dev/sda block device?
yup, not device ...but i've got /dev/dm/0 1 and 2... but I dont know what that is
this are block devices handled with lvm. i do not use lvm so i do not know...
me neither, but they are there :)
sata_sil and libata are loaded http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6376
I get 3 devices in /dev/dm ...that disk is unformatted...which one should I use? and why do I not get /dev/sd* ?
i do not know :(. You should get the /dev/sd* devices. do you see something in the dmesg?
i do not have sata myself so i can not know for sure. do you have any /dev/scsi0 or something?
nope nothing beside that dm thingy
and I cannot unload dm_mod ...it's in use
i do not know. sata support in linux is a little bit beta http://linuxmafia.com/faq/Hardware/sata.html
I think dm_mod is resposible for this but I dont know how to unload it... well thanks so far :)
